specific_issues.description:
Lobbying Report: January 1 - March 31, 2016
Legislation
H.R.478 Protecting Children from Electronic Cigarette Advertising Act of 2015 (Lobbying activities related to a bill to protect children from electronic cigarette advertising)
S.430 Protecting Children from Electronic Cigarette Advertising Act of 2015 (Lobbying activities related to a bill to protect children from electronic cigarette advertising)
H.R. 1375 Child Nicotine Poisoning Prevention Act of 2015 (Lobbying activities related to a bill that directs the Consumer Product Safety Commission to promulgate a rule requiring liquid nicotine containers to be designed with special packaging that is difficult for children to open).
S. 142 Child Nicotine Poisoning Prevention Act of 2015. (Lobbying activities related to a bill that directs the Consumer Product Safety Commission to promulgate a rule requiring liquid nicotine containers to be designed with special packaging that is difficult for children to open).
H.R. 662 Traditional Cigar Manufacturing and Small Business Jobs Preservation Act of 2015 (Lobbying activities related to opposing exemption of cigars from FDA oversight)
S. 441 Traditional Cigar Manufacturing and Small Business Jobs Preservation Act of 2015 (Lobbying activities related to opposing exemption of cigars from FDA oversight)
S. 450 Tobacco Tax Equity Act of 2015 (Lobbying activities related to equalizing taxes on tobacco products)
S. 1129 Tobacco Tax and Enforcement Reform Act (Lobbying activities related to re-introduction of a bill focused on increasing tobacco taxes and preventing smuggling of tobacco products)
H.R. 1749 Smuggled Tobacco Prevention Act (STOP Act) of 2015. (Lobbying activities related reducing tobacco smuggling).
H.R. 2058 FDA Deeming Authority Clarification Act of 2015 (Lobbying activities related to opposing bill to change the grandfather date for newly deemed products)
H.R. 1190 (Lobbying activities related to opposing reducing the Prevention and Public Fund to offset the cost of eliminating the Independent Payment Advisory Board)
Commerce, Justice, Science and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2017 (Lobbying activities related to prohibiting the use of federal funds for the promotion of the sale or export of tobacco or tobacco products)
S. 2100 Tobacco 21 Act (Lobbying activities related to prohibiting the sale or distribution of tobacco products to individuals under the age of 21)
H.R. 3656 Tobacco 21 Act (Lobbying activities related to prohibiting the sale or distribution of tobacco products to individuals under the age of 21)
H.R. 3242 The Child Nicotine Poisoning Prevention Act (Lobbying activities related to requiring special packaging for liquid nicotine containers, and for other purposes)
Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2017 (Lobbying activities related to FY 2017 appropriations for the Food and Drug Administration and protecting FDAs authority to oversee all tobacco products)
Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2017 (Lobbying activities related to FY 2017 appropriations for the Food and Drug Administration and protecting FDAs authority to oversee all tobacco products )
Departments of Labor, Health and Human Services, and Education, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2017 (Lobbying activities related to FY 2017 appropriations for the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention)
Departments of Labor, Health and Human Services, and Education, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2017 (Lobbying activities related to FY 2017 appropriations for the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention)
H.R.3042 Stop Tobacco Sales to Youth Act of 2015 (Lobbying activities related to preventing the interstate sale and delivery of electronic cigarettes, cigars, and pipe tobacco to minors in violation of law)
H.R. 3762 The Restoring Americans Healthcare Freedom Reconciliation Act (Lobbying activities related to opposing repeal of the Prevention and Public Health Fund)
Issues
Tobacco Taxes (Lobbying activities related to equalizing taxes on tobacco products and increasing taxes on all tobacco products)
International Trade (Lobbying activities related to tobacco products and international trade agreements including the Trans-Pacific Partnership, the Transatlantic Trade and Investment Partnership, and a prohibition on the promotion of sale or export of tobacco or tobacco products)
Lobbying activities related to FDA implementation of the Tobacco Control Act, proposed deeming rule, and regulation all tobacco products, including e-cigarettes and cigars
Appropriations (Lobbying activities related to FDA, CDC/OSH)
Prevention and Public Health Fund (Lobbying activities related to preserving the Fund)
Tobacco cessation coverage in Medicaid
Protecting pregnant women and young children from harms of tobacco
Agencies Visited US House of Representatives US Senate US Trade Representative US Department of Health and Human Services

ali_info.federal_agencies: U.S. HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES, U.S. SENATE, U.S. Trade Representative (USTR), Health & Human Services - Dept of (HHS)
